messages.content: ComfyUI-RequestsPoster is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows sending HTTP POST requests to specified URLs based on input triggers.

ComfyUI-RequestsPoster allows sending Text to Image or Image to Image generation requests to the Stable Diffusion 3 API, posting messages and images to Discord via Webhook URLs, and posting messages and images to X (Twitter).
What is required to use the Stable Diffusion 3 API functionality in ComfyUI-RequestsPoster?
To use the Stable Diffusion 3 API functionality in ComfyUI-RequestsPoster, you need an API KEY from StabilityAI and have at least 4 credits in your account balance.
What module needs to be installed in the Python environment used by ComfyUI to post to X (Twitter) using ComfyUI-RequestsPoster?
The 'tweepy' module needs to be installed in the Python environment used by ComfyUI to post to X (Twitter) using ComfyUI-RequestsPoster.

You can install ComfyUI-RequestsPoster by searching for it in the 'Install Custom Nodes' section of ComfyUI-Manager, or by copying the repository clone URL into 'Install via Git URL' in ComfyUI-Manager, or by running 'git clone https://github.com/aburahamu/ComfyUI-RequestsPoster.git' in the ComfyUI > Cutom_nodes folder using the command prompt.
To update ComfyUI-RequestsPoster, open ComfyUI > custom_nodes > ComfyUI-RequestsPoster in the command prompt and run 'git pull'.
What is the license for ComfyUI-RequestsPoster?
ComfyUI-RequestsPoster is licensed under the AGPL-3.0 license.
